snippet: LEAD: Rose Bird, who was ousted by the voters as California's Chief Justice, will become a commentator for television stations KABC in Los Angeles and KGO in San Francisco, which are owned by Capital Cities/ABC Inc. Ms. Bird will begin work within...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Rose Bird, who was ousted by the voters as California's Chief Justice, will become a commentator for television stations KABC in Los Angeles and KGO in San Francisco, which are owned by Capital Cities/ABC Inc. Ms. Bird will begin work within the next few days, a spokesman for KABC said.
